Iowa Ruby Brigade

A user group for Ruby and Rails enthusiasts.

July 2008

Thursday, July 10, 2008

6:00 - 7:30 PM

Speaker

You

Topic

Tips & Tricks / Q&A / Hackfest

Bring your Ruby questions, puzzlers, tips, & tricks and join us for an open Q&A and coding session.  Whether you're a newbie with questions, an intermediate Rubyist, or an advanced Ruby hacker, this meeting is for you.  Get your questions answered, share your knowledge, and get to know your fellow programmers.

Please come with at least one question or tip.

Meeting Location

Coldwell Banker / Mid-America Group Realtors
8825 Northpark Court
Johnston, Iowa

Just north of I35/80 at the 86th Street exit.

GPS coordinates: N 41° 39.368' W 93° 44.378'

Wi-fi Internet access is available.

Click here for a map.

Dinner After the Meeting

If you can, please plan to join us for dinner at a local restaurant after the meeting.
